003package org.nasdanika.architecture.c4;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList;
006import org.nasdanika.architecture.core.Domain;
007import org.nasdanika.architecture.core.Node;
008
009/**
010 * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
011 * A representation of the model object '<em><b>System</b></em>'.
012 * <!-- end-user-doc -->
013 *
014 * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
015 * A software system is the highest level of abstraction and describes something that delivers value to its users, whether they are human or not. This includes the software system you are modelling, and the other software systems upon which your software system depends (or vice versa). Systems extends Domain to support adding reference data, e.g. technology stack.
016 * <!-- end-model-doc -->
017 *
018 * <p>
019 * The following features are supported:
020 * </p>
021 * <ul>
022 *   <li>{@link org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System#isExternal <em>External</em>}</li>
023 *   <li>{@link org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System#getContainers <em>Containers</em>}</li>
024 *   <li>{@link org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System#getSubsystems <em>Subsystems</em>}</li>
025 * </ul>
026 *
027 * @see org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.C4Package#getSystem()
028 * @model
029 * @generated
030 */
031public interface System extends Node, Domain {
032        /**
033         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>External</b></em>' attribute.
034         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
035         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
036         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
037         * If true, the system is external to the system (landscape) described by the architecture. In other words it is not part of the system (landscape), but belongs to the system context/surroundings.
038         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
039         * @return the value of the '<em>External</em>' attribute.
040         * @see #setExternal(boolean)
041         * @see org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.C4Package#getSystem_External()
042         * @model
043         * @generated
044         */
045        boolean isExternal();
046
047        /**
048         * Sets the value of the '{@link org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System#isExternal <em>External</em>}' attribute.
049         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
050         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
051         * @param value the new value of the '<em>External</em>' attribute.
052         * @see #isExternal()
053         * @generated
054         */
055        void setExternal(boolean value);
056
057        /**
058         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Containers</b></em>' containment reference list.
059         * The list contents are of type {@link org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.Container}.
060         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
061         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
062         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
063         * Containers consituting the system.
064         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
065         * @return the value of the '<em>Containers</em>' containment reference list.
066         * @see org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.C4Package#getSystem_Containers()
067         * @model containment="true"
068         * @generated
069         */
070        EList<Container> getContainers();
071
072        /**
073         * Returns the value of the '<em><b>Subsystems</b></em>' containment reference list.
074         * The list contents are of type {@link org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.System}.
075         * <!-- begin-user-doc -->
076         * <!-- end-user-doc -->
077         * <!-- begin-model-doc -->
078         * Subsystem is a logical grouping of related containers and subsystems.
079         * <!-- end-model-doc -->
080         * @return the value of the '<em>Subsystems</em>' containment reference list.
081         * @see org.nasdanika.architecture.c4.C4Package#getSystem_Subsystems()
082         * @model containment="true"
083         * @generated
084         */
085        EList<System> getSubsystems();
086
087} // System
